text: Hezekiah king of Judah sent to the king of Assyria at Lachish, saying, “I have offended you. Withdraw from me. That which you put on me, I will bear.” The king of Assyria appointed to Hezekiah king of Judah three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents18:14 A talent is about 30 kilograms or 66 pounds or 965 Troy ounces of gold.
